mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (post_type, member_id, title, content, status, created_id, created_at) VALUES (#{postType}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{status}, #{createdId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS streamerId, m.profile AS profileUrl, GROUP_CONCAT(p.id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC) AS postIdList FROM posts p JOIN members m ON p.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN streamers s ON m.id = s.member_id WHERE p.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND p.post_type = #{postType} GROUP BY s.id, m.profile ORDER BY MAX(p.created_at) DESC;

SELECT p.id AS postId, p.member_id AS writerId, p.title, p.content, m.profile AS profileUrl, m.nickname, c.content AS comment FROM posts p LEFT JOIN members m ON p.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN comments c ON c.post_id = p.id AND c.member_id = #{memberId} WHERE p.id = #{postId}
